title: BONUS Ep. #4 | Korean Lessons with Eric Nam
description:
Time for some more L.A. self-quarantine stories and Korean language learning fun with Eric and Brian Nam! What are Eric and Brian's goals for this self isolation period? Stay healthy and safe, Daebak Fam!
Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.
Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios
Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !
SUPPORT & JOIN DIVE Studios' Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/divestudios
#EricNam #에릭남 #Quarantine #Korean #LearnKorean #LanguageLearning #DaebakShow #DIVEStudios
